name: Simple Blocks
description:
Welcome to Simple Blocks! - 08012021-Beta005

This game is obviously in development. I have been a Full Stack Web Developer for a long time, and I have always wanted to work on a game. I have been working on two for the the last month, and here is one that I thought 'would be the simplest to do'... how wrong I was ;)

If you have any ideas/suggestions for improvements, please feel free and let me know in the comments section.

Obviously quite a few bugs, and some I don't know about!

Game Story

Blocks have invaded Earth, blah blah

Controls

You can use your mouse and click on the left side of the screen to move a block to the left, or the right to move right. You can also use the left and right keys on the keyboard!

Difficulty

The difficulty level is set a little too low at the moment, but I am working on that with more rows popping up at the bottom, perhaps moving faster as you progress and/or something I haven't thought of.

Tested on

  • iPhone 6 Plus
  • Google Pixel 4A
  • iPhone X
  • Windows Chrome
  • macOS Chrome
